data.text:
Adam was born and raised in West Virginia, and educated at Arizona State University (B.A. in History) and Covenant Theological Seminary (M.Div.). He previously served churches in Phoenix, Arizona and St. Louis, Missouri, before joining Ministry to State. As a Ministry Associate with MTS-DC, Adam ministers to our political leaders and Capitol Hill staff, helping them answer questions concerning the Christian faith, to develop a biblical worldview, and to form and grow a relationship with Jesus Christ.

Adam and his wife Aimee have been married since 2016.

Mission to North America is a registered 501(c)(3) religious charity and an ECFA accredited organization. Donations are securely collected and processed by Paperless Transactions. Contributions are solicited with the understanding that Mission to North America has complete discretion and control over the use of all donated funds.
